name: Pig-ment: Eat n Die
description:
Pig-mentRun n Eat

You poor thingy~ you crossed the river but a huge wave just destroyed the bridge. Go back home before you starve to death!

HOW TO PLAY

Eat the everything you see while trying to reach your home, at the end tho~ y'know

CONTROLS
  • MOVE: arrows
  • RUN: X button
